column4: why can't i choose the free space on my hard drive? it's showing blue which is where the winxp is at.. the green is at 2% where ubuntu would be installed? and then theres 40% free white space?
will it use the white space to install into as well? or is it just going to be the 2% of space being used by ubuntu
ok nevermind i guess i will just figure it out myself
seems that it how it has to be
